Summary: What appeared to be a satellite suddenly flashed incredibly bright and took off in a new direction.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside my house, looking directly above me to see if the meteor shower had picked up enough to warrant getting out a lawn chair. I saw what I thought was a satellite moving from north to south across the sky at about the same speed as a normal satellite. I focused my attention on the object but sd I watched the "satellite," it suddenly flashed bright enough to cause shadows on the ground, and took off in a totally new direction at an incredible rate across the sky before disappearing completely. The only reason I bothered to report this event was that I saw that someone else relatively near my location also reported a sighting that matches mine exactly.
